properties.description: Replace manual particle animation with tsparticles library for better SSR handling and visual smoothness.
properties.rationale: Manual implementation uses ClientOnly causing pop-in and Math.random() causing hydration mismatch. tsparticles library with Nuxt module is a better approach.
properties.component_target: Unknown initially, likely index page or layout
properties.outcome: Successfully replaced manual animation with @tsparticles/nuxt in pages/index.vue. Basic 'stars' preset implemented.
properties.verification_method: Run dev server, check visuals and browser console for hydration errors.
properties.identified_improvements: Particle options can be further customized for specific aesthetics (colors, shapes, movement).

properties.description: Correct pages/index.vue: Move particlesOptions and onLoad definitions into the <script setup> block.
properties.rationale: Variables were defined outside the setup context, causing Vue warnings and preventing particles from rendering.
properties.outcome: Successfully moved particle configuration code into <script setup> in pages/index.vue. Installed @tsparticles/engine.
properties.verification_method: Re-run dev server, check visuals and browser console for warnings/errors.

properties.description: Debug particle visibility: Increase zIndex and simplify options in pages/index.vue.
properties.rationale: Engine loads ('Particles loaded' log seen) but particles not visible. Likely a z-index/styling issue.
properties.changes: Set fullScreen.zIndex to 9999, optionally simplify particle config for high contrast.
properties.outcome: Applied debugging configuration to pages/index.vue (zIndex: 9999, simplified particles). Fixed related TS errors.
properties.verification_method: Re-run dev server, check visuals (expect overlay) and browser console.

properties.description: Refine particle effect: Set zIndex to 0 and apply subtle configuration (colors, size, opacity, speed) in pages/index.vue.
properties.rationale: Debugging confirmed visibility issue was z-index. Now applying correct z-index and desired subtle aesthetic.
properties.changes: Set fullScreen.zIndex to 0, adjust particle number, color, size, opacity, move properties. Disable interactivity.
properties.outcome: Applied refined particle configuration (zIndex: 0, subtle colors/size/opacity/speed) to pages/index.vue.
properties.verification_method: Run dev server, check visuals for subtle effect and correct layering.

properties.description: Confine particle effect to hero section: Disable fullScreen, set zIndex=0, add absolute positioning classes.
properties.rationale: Particles currently use fixed positioning due to fullScreen=true, remaining visible on scroll. Need to contain it within the parent section.
properties.changes: Set fullScreen.enable=false, remove fullScreen.zIndex, add root zIndex:0 in options, add class='absolute inset-0' to component tag.
properties.outcome: Confined particles to hero section: Disabled fullScreen, set root zIndex:0, added 'absolute inset-0' class to component.
properties.verification_method: Run dev server, check if particles scroll away with the hero section.
